mapper.update: update hall_movie set movie_id = #{movieId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hall_id = #{hallId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fare_money = #{fareMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where hall_movie_id = #{hallMovieId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select hall_movie_id, movie_id, hall_id, start_time, end_time, fare_money from hall_movie
